name: The Battle of Aramoor
description:
The Battle of Aramoor is a single player RPG adventure across the land of Aramoor. You must journey with your allies to defeat the creatures plaguing the land and find an ancient sage who can cast the ultimate spell, OMEGA. 

Includes 5 different mini-games that can be played to increase your performance in battle.
